Package com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationDeploymentEngine
    This class figures out all of the transitions which need to be made to bring the system to the final state by processing all of the source data.
    ApplicationDeploymentEngineTest  
    Change
    Holds the details for a single change which needs to happen
    ChangeSet
    This is a class with a bit of a split personality.
    ComponentDeploymentData
    Contains all of the data which we gather about this component for the purposes of this deployment.
    ComponentDeploymentData.ComponentId
    Unique identifier for a deployed component - the combination of component name and application short name
    ComponentDeploymentDataManager
    The ComponentDeploymentData items need to be populated with various facts as we merge everything together from the different sources.
    DependencyManager
    This class contains logic for working out dependency chains so that they can be used in deployment logic.
    DependencyManagerTest  
    DifferenceManager  
    HostnameResolver  
    JitYumUpdateManager
    The purpose of this class is to perform the following behaviour: Get a list of packages that need to be in the yum repo Create a CSV file with metadata for those packages SCP the CSV file to the correct yum repo box Poll a directory for output from the createrepo-q-tool If a success then print log and continue, if failure then print log and fail To use this class you must do the following in order: JitYumUpdateManager.setComponents(Map) with the component map used elsewhere JitYumUpdateManager.createRepoQCsv() to create the CSV (can be done in the prepare step #doJitYumRepoUpdate(String) pass the env to we are deploying to, similar to the other deployment classes.
    PlanManager
    Provides functionality relating to deployment plans
    TestHostnameResolver
    Tests for HostnameResolver.
    TransitionManager
    This class provides functionality for handling transitions.
    TransitionManager.Buckets
    Enables a complex return type from a method call
    TransitionManagerTest  
    YamlManager
    This class provides functionality for making sensible updates to the YAML based on the deployment instructions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChangeType
    These are the types of changes that can be executed within an zone
    DependencyManager.Choice
    Indicates how a given ChangeType will manifest in terms of the actual deployment.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HostnameResolver.UnresolvableHostOrRoleException
